trans-unit.source: Adds graphics presenting the evolution of sales and orders to the Stats dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Adauga grafice reprezentand evolutia vanzarilor si a comenzilor la Tabloul de bord.

trans-unit.source: In your Back Office, you can modify the following order statuses: Awaiting Check Payment, Payment Accepted, Preparation in Progress, Shipping, Delivered, Canceled, Refund, Payment Error, Out of Stock, and Awaiting Bank Wire Payment.
trans-unit.target: In interfata de administrare poti modifica urmatoarele stadii de comenzi: Asteapta plata cecului, Plata acceptata, In pregatire, Se livreaza, Livrata, Anulata, Rambursare, Eroare de plata, Stoc epuizat si Asteapta transferul bancar.

trans-unit.source: These order statuses cannot be removed from the Back Office; however you have the option to add more.
trans-unit.target: Aceste stadii de comenzi nu pot fi sterse, ai totusi optiunea de a adauga altele noi.

trans-unit.source: The following graphs represent the evolution of your shop's orders and sales turnover for a selected period.
trans-unit.target: Urmatoarele grafice reprezinta evolutia comenzilor si a profitului magazinului tau pentru perioada aleasa.

trans-unit.source: You should often consult this screen, as it allows you to quickly monitor your shop's sustainability. It also allows you to monitor multiple time periods.
trans-unit.target: Ar fi bine sa consulti cat mai des aceasta pagina, pentru ca iti permite sa monitorizezi starea magazinului tau. De asemenea, iti permite sa monitorizezi pe multiple perioade.

trans-unit.source: Only valid orders are graphically represented.
trans-unit.target: Sunt reprezentate grafic numai comenzile valide.

trans-unit.source: You can view the distribution of order statuses below.
trans-unit.target: Poti vedea mai jos distributia stadiilor comenzilor.
Nu sunt comenzi pentru aceasta perioada.
Procentajul comenzilor in functie de stadiu.

trans-unit.source: Enrich your stats, add graphics presenting the evolution of your sales and orders.
trans-unit.target: Imbogateste statisticile adaugand grafice ale evolutiei vanzarilor si comenzilor.
